text: Chula Vista is a census-designated place (CDP) in Cameron County, in the U.S. state of Texas. Prior to the 2010 census the community was part of the Chula Vista-Orason CDP. It is part of the Brownsville-Harlingen Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Geography== Chula Vista is near the geographic center of Cameron County, east of Los Fresnos and north of the center of Brownsville. It is bordered on the west by Orason. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Cameron County, Texas Category:Census-designated places in Texas
title: Chula Vista, Cameron County, Texas
